page.title: 03TRANSPORT_TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: Perranporth becomes very busy in the summer months and the amount of traffic increases considerably . Some children from Perranporth school surveyed the amount of traffic.Here are the results_ {Boscawen Rd.}180 vehicles in 45mins. {Liskey Hill.}207 vehicles in 45mins. {St.Pirans Rd.}195 vehicles in 45mins. {St.Georges Hill.}90 vehicles in 45mins. In one hour,this means approx.898 vehicles are travelling through the centre of Perranporth in a peak period.We estimated that thousands of vehicles are travelling in our town all the time.The problem in the summer is the traffic congestion caused by tourists adding to the normal local transport.The facts were collected on June 26th. at 11a.m. 1985.
